title: The Bombshell Stories in Bob Woodward's "Fear"
description:
Legendary journalist Bob Woodward is out with a new book that pulls back the curtain on President Trump's White House. What are the claims in "Fear," and do they even matter to a divided country? David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg News Chief Content Officer Marty Schenker. 
FOLLOW UP
You can follow Marty at @mschenker
----
TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
